sourcesContent:
import Koa from 'koa'
import JWT from 'koa-jwt'
import cors from '@koa/cors'
import path from 'path'
import koabody from 'koa-body'
import json from 'koa-json'
import helmet from 'koa-helmet'
import routes from './routes/routes'
import statics from 'koa-static'
import conpos from 'koa-compose'
import compress from 'koa-compress'
import errhandle from './commog/Errhanle'
import config from './config/index'
const app=new Koa()
const isnove=(process.env.NODE_ENV==='production'?false:true)
const jws=(JWT({ secret: config.secret }).unless({path:[/^\/public/,/\/login/,/\/getCaptcha/]}));
const midewell=conpos([
    koabody(),
    cors(),
    json({ pretty:false,param:'pretty'}),
    helmet(),
    statics(path.join(__dirname,'../public')),
    errhandle,
    jws,
])
if(!isnove){
    app.use(compress())
}
app.use(midewell).listen(3000)
app.use( routes())

import koaCombineRouters from 'koa-combine-routers'
import routers from './PublicRouter'
import rooter from './logincontroller'
export default koaCombineRouters(
    routers,
    rooter
)

import koaCombineRouters from 'koa-combine-routers'
import routers from './PublicRouter'
import rooter from './logincontroller'
export default koaCombineRouters(
    routers,
    rooter
)

import koaRouter from 'koa-router'
import DemoController from '../api/demoController' 
import ljyController from '../api/ljyController' 
const Rourer=new koaRouter()
Rourer.get('/api/deomo', DemoController.demo)
Rourer.get('/api/ljy', ljyController.ljy)
module.exports=Rourer

import koaRouter from 'koa-router'
import DemoController from '../api/demoController' 
import ljyController from '../api/ljyController' 
const Rourer=new koaRouter()
Rourer.get('/api/deomo', DemoController.demo)
Rourer.get('/api/ljy', ljyController.ljy)
module.exports=Rourer

import koaRouter from 'koa-router'
import PublicController from '../api/PublicController' 
import ljyController from '../api/ljyController' 
const Rourer=new koaRouter()
Rourer.get('/getCaptcha', PublicController.getCaptcha)
Rourer.get('/api/ljy', ljyController.ljy)
export default Rourer

import koaRouter from 'koa-router'
import PublicController from '../api/PublicController' 
import ljyController from '../api/ljyController' 
const Rourer=new koaRouter()
Rourer.get('/getCaptcha', PublicController.getCaptcha)
Rourer.get('/api/ljy', ljyController.ljy)
export default Rourer

import root from 'koa-router'
import getsend from '../api/logincontroller'
const rooter=new root()
rooter.post('/forget',getsend.forget)
rooter.post('/login',getsend.login)
export default rooter

import root from 'koa-router'
import getsend from '../api/logincontroller'
const rooter=new root()
rooter.post('/forget',getsend.forget)
rooter.post('/login',getsend.login)
export default rooter

import root from 'koa-router'
import getsend from '../api/logincontroller'
const rooter=new root()
rooter.prefix('/login')
rooter.post('/forget',getsend.forget)
rooter.post('/login',getsend.login)
rooter.post('/cs',getsend.fanhui)
rooter.post('/redylogin',getsend.redylogin)

export default rooter

import root from 'koa-router'
import getsend from '../api/logincontroller'
const rooter=new root()
rooter.prefix('/login')
rooter.post('/forget',getsend.forget)
rooter.post('/login',getsend.login)
rooter.post('/cs',getsend.fanhui)
rooter.post('/redylogin',getsend.redylogin)

export default rooter
